text: Ke mominaharuko nimti ahile pani yasto samaya a'eko chaina ki uniharuka hrdaya allahako lagi ra juna satya avatarita bhayo tyasako lagi narma (komala) hos? Ra uniharu jasta nabha'ihalos jasala'i unibhanda agadi kitaba pradana gareko thiyo. Ani tyasa pascata lamo kalakhanda bityo. Ani uniharuka hrdaya kathora bha'ihale ra uniharumadhye adhikansa avajnakari chan
